rows: AI Skill title. For this example, enter "Marketing copy for products."
Code of the AI Skill required for custom development. For this example, enter "UsrProductMarketingCopy."
Description of the AI Skill. Creatio.ai uses it to determine which AI Skill to run upon user's request. For this example, enter "Write a marketing copy for a product."
Whether the AI Skill is active. For this example, select "Active."
Whether to use the AI skill in the chat or directly on the system level. For this example, select "Chat."
Whether to use a specific large language model (LLM). Learn more:Creatio.ai models. Leave the field empty to use GPT-4.1.
html:
Field

Field value

Title

AI Skill title. For this example, enter "Marketing copy for products."

Code

Code of the AI Skill required for custom development. For this example, enter "UsrProductMarketingCopy."

Description

Description of the AI Skill. Creatio.ai uses it to determine which AI Skill to run upon user's request. For this example, enter "Write a marketing copy for a product."

Status

Whether the AI Skill is active. For this example, select "Active."

Usage mode

Whether to use the AI skill in the chat or directly on the system level. For this example, select "Chat."

Model

Whether to use a specific large language model (LLM). Learn more: Creatio.ai models. Leave the field empty to use GPT-4.1.
